notes:
# Season 17 Updates
**[S17 UPDATE]**: From my experience testing this build in the current (at the time of writing this) season, there is potential merit in running [Precarious Potency](item_b1305ee6-3027-4131-8797-dcbeb68e3953) as your R1 power. Running Precarious Potency will help with credit generation in the early-game, allowing you to quickly get the items you need by R3 and pick Multiball. By doing this, you're essentially switching your R1 and R5/7 powers.

# Round 1 Power
[Cross-Orbal](item_e567bb63-527f-4c72-8ba1-dc59be1a0dc1) will be your first Power.

You may think about choosing [Multiball](item_5d0e4135-f4e1-42fb-991a-417643064560), but in the early rounds, Cross-Orbal tends to perform better. You'll pick Multiball later.

# Round 1 Items
Realistically, the MAIN item you need to get is  [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418). Everything else here is purely up to how you want to play in the early game.

I typically run [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418), [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0), and pick a third item based on context (enemy team comp, my team comp, what I want to get in the moment, etc.)

round_upgrades.notes: No reason not to buy this.
If you think you need more survivability early (if they have a melee Genji, Reaper, firestrike Reinhardt, etc.)
I don't typically run this, but it is a good option for early-game survivability.
Uptime/survivability if you right-click a lot in the early game.
Run this if you want to play more supportive and earn credits quickly. If you get this, run more weapon damage/lifesteal until round 3.
Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.

notes:
# Round 2 Items
 [Smart Orbs](item_47f5985c-9b63-40d2-938b-63a22154b9be): Buy this even if this is the only thing you can afford. One of the strongest perks for Orb-focused Moira builds.

 [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6): If you can also afford this, purchase this alongside Smart Orbs. It's good early-game AP for your orbs/ultimate.

## What if I can't afford Smart Orbs & Nano Cola?
If you can't afford both, pick up [Smart Orbs](item_47f5985c-9b63-40d2-938b-63a22154b9be). If you have enough leftover for another blue item, pick either [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) or [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56) based on whether you want more weapon damage or cooldown reduction. If you are playing more pure Orb/Ultimate, pick **Multi-Tool**. If you are using some form of right-click power, pick **Custom Stock**. Fill/replace with greens as needed.

## What about purples?
If you're able to purchase Smart Orbs & Nano Cola all in round two, you're already in a good spot. Do **NOT** skip Smart Orbs for a purple at this stage - or ever. If you earn high credits, you'll be able to purchase purples in Round 3.
You won't be able to purchase both Smart Orbs and a purple item, so take that into consideration.

If you absolutely want to buy a purple item in Round 2, here are some you can consider:

- [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4): If you've been using your ult and want it to charge faster, grab this.
- [Extendrils](item_138e73a2-6915-4ffc-bd89-029a85bf94b8): I actually wouldn't ever buy this round 2, but if you want to, go ahead.
- [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98): Good (and necessary in the final build) to slow the enemy team, keep them clumped together, or to chase down low-health enemies.
- [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505): If their team comp naturally has healers, or if your enemy is building lifesteal, that you want to debuff early: [Junker Queen](hero_4794d288-27d9-49e0-a1dd-ffe0f4de3ab1), [Mercy](hero_0e213bfc-3ca9-49c6-9036-e7f344b752da), [Reaper](hero_0449752f-1c58-487b-b9a0-ca727d784457), [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546)

round_upgrades.notes: Absolutely mandatory pickup. Should be the first item you buy in round 2.
If you gained enough credits, pick this up, too.
If their team has a ton of healing that you want to stop early: Junker Queen, Mercy, Reaper, Solider 76, etc.
Good (and necessary in the final build) to slow the enemy team, keep the clumped together, or to chase down low-health enemies. Typically should pick this up in later rounds.
I actually wouldn't ever buy this round 2, but if you want to, go ahead.
Pick this up to charge your ult faster. You'll should be using it two times a match at least with this.
Good for more right-click and AP if you can't afford Nano Cola
S17 Change: I typically run ability lifesteal more for survivability.
Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.

notes:
# Round 3 Powers
For round 3, you'll want to pick up [Multiball](item_5d0e4135-f4e1-42fb-991a-417643064560) now. Your usefulness as a Utility Moira™ will start becoming apparent now.

## Substitute Powers
Realistically, you should never pick any other power over Multiball. Your optional powers will come during Rounds 5 & 7 based on the flow of your specific game.
Check the notes at the top of this guide to see optional powers you can pick from based on your potential needs.

# Round 3 Items
This is where you start buying purple items. Your goal is to build [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) and [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98) as fast as possible so you can become Utility Moira™, but depending on the match's situation, you could pick up the following:
- [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98): As stated earlier, helps with orb upkeep on enemies, keeps them clumped together, or to chase down low-health heroes. You will pick this eventually, but if you want this over Cybervenom now, buy it.
- [Extendrils](item_138e73a2-6915-4ffc-bd89-029a85bf94b8): Your orbs will work at farther ranges from their target, triggering all of your utility (smart orbs, cybervenom, liquid nitrogen, etc.) at greater distances.
- [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce): Raw AP output. Greatly increases orb healing and damage. This is a viable pickup round 3/4 if you're doing well. I recommend this as part of your final build.
- [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4): For more ult uses per round. Goes really well with [Coalegion](item_ff9adeb1-362c-46a4-80ef-4e0eb07479cc).
- [Coalegion](item_ff9adeb1-362c-46a4-80ef-4e0eb07479cc): I wouldn't get this without [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) mainly because you most likely won't be able to use your ult more than once in the early rounds. If you are, then this is a good substitute pick.
- [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b): Special thanks to Yunec for pointing out this item! This is a good pick in-between to generate more AP if you don't run Champion's Kit.

Do **NOT** sell Smart Orbs to buy more purple items or your first purple item. If you have to go [Smart Orbs](item_47f5985c-9b63-40d2-938b-63a22154b9be) and  [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6), do that first. But typically, you should have these in round two and starting buying purples in round 3 unless you and/or your team did not win/get enough points to buy a purple. In this case, pick situational blue items.

round_upgrades.notes: Pick this up by default and/or the enemy team has a LOT of healing.
If you rather slow enemies instead of reduce healing.
If you want pure AP - wouldn't recommend generally until you buy at LEAST one utility item (Cybervenom/Liquid Nitrogen).
Helps trigger Smart Orbs & Cybervenom/Liquid Nitrogen at greater ranges. Do NOT sell Smart Orbs to do this.
Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.
Pick this up to start ramping orb utility usage.

notes:
# Round 4 Items
By this round, you should have your MAIN utility items: [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) and [Liquid Nitrogen](item_a8d99526-05a3-4405-babb-b025479b1b98). 

With these two items, you now slow enemies and reduce healing by 30%. With [Smart Orbs](item_47f5985c-9b63-40d2-938b-63a22154b9be), enemies should be debuffed for a good chunk of time, which will be expanded further with [Extendrils](item_138e73a2-6915-4ffc-bd89-029a85bf94b8).

round_upgrades.notes: Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.
Pick this up to start ramping orb utility usage.

notes:
# Round 5 Powers
From here, you're free to pick whatever power you think would work best in your current match's situation. Check the notes at the top of this build to see a list of powers that could help!

## Cleansing Anti-heal
Huge thanks to Glerp (in the comments) for pointing this out: If the enemy team has [Junker Queen](hero_4794d288-27d9-49e0-a1dd-ffe0f4de3ab1) and/or [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000), you may opt to take  [Voidhoppers](item_d4ce0c76-2500-40d6-b066-dca303be097f) instead of  [Phantasm](item_21ed9c3d-7a54-438f-9188-f21fd7a7dbfb) or [Destruction’s Divide](item_cb7be5fa-0098-4a3c-bf62-efb3738a97e6) to be able to cleanse anti-heal (or burns, stuns, etc).

# Round 5 Items
Make the [Extendrils](item_138e73a2-6915-4ffc-bd89-029a85bf94b8) purchase to extend your orb range.

**NOTE**: If you picked up [Destruction’s Divide](item_cb7be5fa-0098-4a3c-bf62-efb3738a97e6), you may opt to pick the following items that will pair better with that power:
- [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4): Will help you get faster ult charges.
- [Coalegion](item_ff9adeb1-362c-46a4-80ef-4e0eb07479cc): Buffs your allies with 15% increased damaged while being healed by your ultimate.

round_upgrades.notes: Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.
Pick this up to start ramping orb utility usage.

notes:
# Round 6 Items

Feel free to pick up [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) now. This will help with ult charging to pair with your items and powers.

If you picked up a different order of items and powers, just make adjustments and pick up the applicable items needed.

round_upgrades.notes: Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.
Pick this up to start ramping orb utility usage.

notes:
# Round 7 Power
Pick the last power you didn't pick in Round 5:  [Optimal Overflow](item_9d85ca48-b27a-435a-8ef9-247440e0f97d) or [Precarious Potency](item_b1305ee6-3027-4131-8797-dcbeb68e3953).
These last two powers will help healing uptime; this is often important in higher-rated games where people are able to deal more damage.

# Round 7 Items
If you made it to Round 7, your build should looking something like this. You are now the ultimate Utility Moira™ built to support your team with maximum effectiveness.

As always, usually after round 4, this build can take a million twists and turns based on your individual match and needs. This guide is simply a Base Template on what a PURE Utility Moira™ would look like.

Please reach out to me in the comments if you have any suggestions, edits, comments, etc. for me!

Thank you :)

round_upgrades.notes: I don't typically run destruction's divide because my healing output is so high (due to higher AP).
Cross-orbal tends to perform better than powers like Multiball.
Pick this up to start ramping orb utility usage.
Run this if you want to play more supportive and earn credits quickly. If you get this, run more weapon damage/lifesteal until round 3.
